name: Spook's Quest
description:
HALLOW'S EVE IS UPON US!

...Perfect time for candy collecting! It's like trick-or-treating, except you don't even need a costume.

Not only is this game my biggest project so far, it's also made for the 2021 Spooktober Jam!

Everything, except the Multicolor Bitsy engine, is made by me. (Bitsy and Multicolor Bitsy, on the other hand, are made by Adam Le Doux and AurySystem respectively. Pixsy, the engine for creating the image cutscenes, was made by Tinybird.)
